mapper.select: SELECT name,email,subject,feedback,status,reply from public.contact where status!='Terminated';
mapper.update: update public.contact SET status='Terminated' where name=#{T.name} AND email=#{T.email} AND feedback=#{T.feedback};
update public.contact SET reply=#{T.reply} where name=#{T.name} AND email=#{T.email} AND feedback=#{T.feedback};
